title: Просто Надія
overview: Just Hope is a melodrama about a mother of 3 children who, due to the start of a full-scale war, is forced to leave her home for the sake of her family's safety. In a difficult time, without the support of her husband and money, she moves to another city, where she starts a new life and takes the first steps towards realizing her dream - to become a successful baker-confectioner.
